EmailTemplate.subject: Great seeing you in Boston!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for visiting us at the ATA Conference We’re glad we were able to connect with you at the ATA Annual Conference and learn more about the role virtual care plays in your organization’s strategy. {{my.SoloTeams:default=edit me}} About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
